kuda daruwan pawidi kirima gana samaja jala thula athiwi thibena sanwadayata thawath karunu kipayak ekathukala yuthuwa thiyenawa .me gana thawaduratath wada wiwada kirimata awashyathawayak nothibunath apa me karunu gana kala adhyayanayedi atham aya karunu wikruthi kota thibu bawa thahawuru wu nisath uktha prashnaya gana hudu wiwechanawalin nonawathi sambudu sasune chirasthithiya sandaha wisandum yojana idiripath kala yuthu nisath me karunu tika liyannam .mulinma me aya palakarana asathya adahas monawada balamu 1.sampradayata anuwa wayasa 7 n ihala daruwanwa pawidi kala haki bawa kima meya sampurna asathyayaki .kurulleku elawimata haki daruweku pawidi kala hakiya yanna sampradayayi .meya buddha bhashithayakda yanna gana saka sahithaya .kurulleku elawimata wayasa awu 3 ka daruwekutada haka .enisa ewan wayasak pawidi wimata sudusuda yanna sampradaya gathi nowi madhyasthawa sitha balanna .2.pawidiwimata pera daruweku wasaraka kalayak wathpiliweth puhunu wena bawa meyada sampurna asathyayaki .apata danagannata labunu paridi pawidiwimata dina gananakata masa gananakata perada daruwan pansalata bharade .samaja jala thula bhikshun wahansela sitina bawin ee gana wimasa oonama kenekuta saka hara gatha haka .3.islamaye lama wiwaha saha rawathawaththa palliye siduwim wani dewal nisa me karuna gana katha nokala yuthu yayi kimaislamaye mehemayi kithunu aagame mehemayi kiyamin ape waradi sadharanikaranaya karana eka bauddhakamada ?

owungen wadi kotasa me wana thuru sawulge wanshayata paksha wa sitiyo ya. 30 eprayimge gothrayen balawanthayan wa, thamange piya wanshawala kirthimath manushyayan wa siti wisidas atasiyadenek ya. 31 dawith rajakamata path kirimata ena pinisa manassege ardha gothrayen nam sandahan karanu labu dahaatadahak ya. 32 ishrayelwarun wisin karanu labiya yuthu de kimek da yi danena hatiyata satanata piwisena wakawanu therum athi issakarge gothrawala pradhaniyo desiyadenek ya; owunge siyalu sahodarayo da owunge anata yatath wa sitiyo ya. 33 sabulonwarungen siyalu aakara yuddhayudha athi wa, yuddha piliwelata pamina thira sith athi wa piliwelin sitinna puluwan wu aya panasdahasak ya. 34 napthaliwarungen adhipathiwaru dahasak saha owun samanga paliha da hellaya da athi aya thishathdahasak ya. 35 danwarungen satanata sarasi paminena aya wisiatadas hayasiyayak ya. 36 aasherwarungen satanata gos satanata sarasi sitinna puluwan aya sathalisdahasak ya. 37 jordanen egoda rubanwarungen da gadwarungen da manassege ardha gothrayen da satanata siyalu aakara yuddhayudha athi aya eklaksha wisidahasak ya. 38 yuddha piliwelata paminenna puluwan wu me siyalu yuddha bhatayo siyalu ishrayelwarun palanaya kirima sandaha dawith rajakamata path kirimata sampurna sithin hebronta aawo ya.
